rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual information using neutral language ('appeared') without high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
Segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale/impact.
The segment reports cases in other countries but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports cases in other countries, but not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports numerical metrics ('since the start of the year') using standard language.
